TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Undefined GeometricDefinition for an example Facility
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create and update a Facility with undefined GeometricDefinition and the Consumers/Receivers are able to understand (and display) it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer creates a Facility (Camp) with undefined GeometricDefinition. The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly. The Producer updates this Camp with a GeometricDefinition=Polygon. The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly. The Producer updates this Camp again with an undefined GeometricDefintion. The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created a topic which includes message elements belonging to the Facility message schema area. The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the Facility is processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer (A) creates a Camp (Facility) with name XXX_CAMP_5481 and with undefined GeometricDefinition
Notices: XXX in name of the object is meant (in principle) to be replaced by the 3 letter code of the country name. Example for the name of the Organisation: ITA_ CAMP_5481
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers (B) receive and display the Camp correctly (not on the map).

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The Producer (A) updates the Camp with GeometricDefinition=Polygon.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers (B) receive and display the Camp correctly (also on the map).

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The Producer (A) updates the Camp again with an undefined GeometricDefinition.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers (B) receive and display the Camp correctly (again not on the map).
